  • I write this blog to think clearly, improve through feedback, and connect with other builders. If that resonates with you, read on.

    What you’ll find by reading this blog, writings on:

    • Full-stack development, Web3, and blockchain
    • Lessons learned through Skin in The Game
    • Mental models gained by doing, thinking, and refining

    The purpose is simple:

    To clarify my thoughts through writing. To build and share useful ideas, philosophies, and frameworks, I gained by going through the development process. And to get feedback from building in public so we can improve. This blog is a home for stress-tested knowledge — built through action with intent.

    What to expect:

    • Posts grounded in real experience
    • Ideas improved over time through trial and error
    • Honest thinking — open to challenge, yours and mine

    If you're also learning to build, or thinking deeply about how things work, you may find value here.

    Feedback is always welcome:

    If you see a bug in my thinking, or you hold a key-insight I could expend upon, feel free to reach out on: LinkedIn, X/Twitter, or leave a simple eMail behind.
